column1: The US is having so many disasters and tragedies
It suddenly hit me as I was scrolling through my Facebook feed.
TIFU by getting Reddit banned in Russia
If Leonardo Dicaprio ever wins an Oscar, he should pull out a dusty piece of paper and do an acceptance speech as if it's from 1993
Girl at Disneyworld challenges Gaston to an arm wresting contest.
Look what just went up on Broadway.
Former President Jimmy Carter reveals he has cancer
So we introduced our new puppy to our cat today. I think it went pretty well.
Huge explosion reported in Chinese port city of Tianjin
TIL in Finland, speeding tickes are calculated on a percentage of a person's income. This causes some Finnish millionaires to face fines of over $100,000.
Huge explosion in Tianjin, China
Had a Filipino boodle fight experience

IamA Mike Shinoda AMA!

I'm the girl with ovarian cysts whose mother wouldn't let her get treatment. Now that I'm on birth control insurance won't cover it and I don't want to switch since this one seems to work wonderfully. Told my OBGYN and she slipped me six months of free samples. Just wanted to share the joy!

I've heard that one of the purposes of the "fresh cut grass" smell is a type of distress signal that warns nearby plants to start moving nutrients to the roots before they get cut down. Is there any truth to this?
Behind the back Home Run
PsBattle: Shia LaBeouf Stretching
Forget legal pot. This is the real reason you should visit my home state of Colorado! (Just don‰Ûªt move here.) [OC by Carl Elwood Meredith] [3648x5472]
